trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SEQ_00<tab>Lyse would not delay in beginning the search for the Yasakani<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Magatama.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_TODO_00<tab>Search for Shiosai.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>I'll admit I had my doubts, but this is a “blessing” worthy of the name. One cannot help wondering what other magicks the Kojin possess...
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_LYSE_000_010<tab>If this is Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato, then Shiosai, the overseer, should be around here somewhere...
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_011<tab>I daresay one of the locals will be able to point us in his direction.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_012<tab>Though...now that I look around, I get the distinct impression we are not welcome here...
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_LYSE_000_020<tab>In a place like this, it's hard to tell where the important people live. I mean, <var 1A 02 /var>everywhere<var 1A 01 /var> has a sea view...
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>Soroban called him the overseer. One can only assume he is some sort of leader in the community...
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_LYSE_000_029<tab>So...this is our man?
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_030<tab>...Leave this place and never return. We have no need of wide-eyed wanderers.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_LYSE_000_031<tab>Sorry, I didn't mean to stare. My name is Lyse, and these are my friends, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_LYSE_000_032<tab>We're looking for the overseer of Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato, Shiosai. That's you, isn't it?
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_033<tab>...The Kojin of the Blue sent you hither, did they?
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_034<tab>I am no overseer, nor ever would I claim to be one. I am high priest of Shisui of the Violet Tides. Shiosai.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_LYSE_000_035<tab>So you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> the man we're looking for! Great! We need your help. We're looking for this jewel called the Yasakani<var 1F /var>no─
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_036<tab>Stop. I will hear no more.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_037<tab>We will suffer no outside troubles in our sanctuary. Especially those of would-be treasure hunters.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ISOBE_000_038<tab><chirp> <chirp>
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_039<tab>Quiet, Isobe, or there will be no dango for dinner.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_040<tab>Ahem. I can do naught to aid you. I say to you again, leave this place and never return.

TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>...At the very least, <var 1A 02 /var>sir<var 1A 01 /var>, you might condescend to tell us of your village, and of why you are so loath to show us even the most <var 1A 02 /var>basic<var 1A 01 /var> courtesy.

TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_042<tab>...Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato is our sanctuary. Under the benevolent leadership of the Ruby Princess, sovereign of Shisui, we Raen enjoy humble yet fulfilling lives. But it was not always so.

TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_043<tab>Long ago, our forebears were driven from their ancestral lands. Beneath the waters, they sought refuge from the ravages of war, and here they flourished. All that we are─our culture, our traditions─was born of the sea. As was I.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_044<tab>Though we have engaged others in diplomacy, it has ever been with the utmost caution. Isolation and independence are essential to preserving our way of life.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_045<tab>So it was when Doma fell twenty-five years past. The Ruby Princess, in her wisdom, decreed that we would take no part. As it was, so ever shall it be.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_046<tab>Forever and ever apart... Forgive me. I understand now how highly you value your way of life, and how you will suffer none to endanger it.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_047<tab>You may be assured that we have no desire to do so. And I would hope that we have given you no cause to assume otherwise.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_048<tab>...You have not. But this changes nothing.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_049<tab>Regardless of your intentions, it is not my place to break with tradition.

TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_050<tab>I must consider the wishes of all who call Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato home. For me to defy their will and permit outsiders to remain would be a gross betrayal of my responsibilities. Please do not ask this of me.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_051<tab>...Thank you for your time, sir.

TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_LYSE_000_060<tab>Everywhere we go it's the same. “Go away, we don't want any.” You'd think I'd be used to it by now, but some stupid part of me just can't help hoping for the best.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_SHIOSAI_000_065<tab>It is not for me to make exceptions. I am bound by our rules, as are you. Please, leave us be.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>And so it continues. Another village, another deaf ear.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>Clearly, Gyr Abania is not the only place with walls.
TEXT_STMBDA309_02485_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>I'm starting to wonder if this was all a huge mistake. Gosetsu couldn't have known we would take this long. I only hope he's still alive...
